org.jscsi.target.connection.stage.fullfeature

Class TargetFullFeatureStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jscsi.target.connection.stage.TargetStage
      • org.jscsi.target.connection.stage.fullfeature.TargetFullFeatureStage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormatUnitStage, InquiryStage, LogoutStage, ModeSenseStage, PingStage, ReadCapacityStage, ReadOrWriteStage, ReportLunsStage, RequestSenseStage, SendDiagnosticStage, TestUnitReadyStage, TextNegotiationStage, UnsupportedOpCodeStage

    public abstract class TargetFullFeatureStage
extends TargetStage
    This class is an abstract super-class for stages of the TargetFullFeaturePhase.
    Author:
    Andreas Ergenzinger
    See Also:
    TargetStage

    • Method Detail

      • createFixedFormatErrorPdu

        protected static final org.jscsi.parser.ProtocolDataUnit createFixedFormatErrorPdu(FieldPointerSenseKeySpecificData[] senseKeySpecificData,
                                                          AdditionalSenseCodeAndQualifier additionalSenseCodeAndQualifier,
                                                          int initiatorTaskTag,
                                                          int expectedDataTransferLength)
        Creates a PDU with FixedFormatSenseData that must be sent to the initiator after receiving a Command Descriptor Block with an illegal field.
        Parameters:
        senseKeySpecificData - contains a list of all illegal fields
        additionalSenseCodeAndQualifier - provides more specific information about the cause of the check condition
        initiatorTaskTag - used by the initiator to identify the task
        expectedDataTransferLength - the amount of payload data expected by the initiator (i.e. allocated buffer space)
        Returns:
        the error PDU

      • createFixedFormatErrorPdu

        protected static final org.jscsi.parser.ProtocolDataUnit createFixedFormatErrorPdu(FieldPointerSenseKeySpecificData[] senseKeySpecificData,
                                                          int initiatorTaskTag,
                                                          int expectedDataTransferLength)
        Creates a PDU with FixedFormatSenseData that must be sent to the initiator after receiving a Command Descriptor Block with an illegal field, which requires the the additional sense code AdditionalSenseCodeAndQualifier.INVALID_FIELD_IN_CDB.
        Parameters:
        senseKeySpecificData - contains a list of all illegal fields
        initiatorTaskTag - used by the initiator to identify the task
        expectedDataTransferLength - the amount of payload data expected by the initiator (i.e. allocated buffer space)
        Returns:
        the error PDU

      • createScsiResponsePdu

        protected static final org.jscsi.parser.ProtocolDataUnit createScsiResponsePdu(org.jscsi.parser.scsi.SCSIStatus status,
                                                      int initiatorTaskTag,
                                                      int expectedDataTransferLength,
                                                      int responseDataSize)
        Creates a SCSI Response PDU with a length zero data segment. Objects created with this method can be used as replies in task terminating with SCSIStatus.GOOD which do not require additional data to be transfered, or for creating follow-up PDU with SCSIStatus.CHECK_CONDITION status sent after Data-In PDUs with sense data.
        Parameters:
        status - the SCSI status of the task
        initiatorTaskTag - used by the initiator to identify the task
        expectedDataTransferLength - total amount of payload data in bytes expected by the initiator
        responseDataSize - actual amount of payload data in bytes sent by the target
        Returns:
        the SCSI Response PDU

      • sendResponse

        protected final void sendResponse(int initiatorTaskTag,
                int expectedDataTransferLength,
                IResponseData responseData)
                           throws InterruptedException,
                                  IOException,
                                  org.jscsi.exception.InternetSCSIException
        Sends a two byte sequence of a Data-In and a SCSI Response PDU with the specified responseData payload to the initiator.
        Parameters:
        initiatorTaskTag - used by the initiator to identify the task
        expectedDataTransferLength - the total amount of payload data in bytes expected by the initiator

        The method might throw exceptions during PDU serialization and sending.

        responseData - the data requested by the initiator
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        IOException
        org.jscsi.exception.InternetSCSIException
